content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_python_file" command to run the script "my_script.py" located in the "Atlas/executed_code/" directory. I also used the "browse_website" command to gather information on Python from Wikipedia, but the "get_hyperlinks" command failed due to too much output. I then used the "get_text_summary" command to gather a summary of Python and its features. I used the "write_tests" command to create test cases for the "add" and "subtract" functions in a given code. I used the "execute_shell" command to list files in the workspace directory. I used the "analyze_code" command to correct a variable error in a given code. I used the "write_to_file" command to write a message to a file, and then used the "read_file" command to read the message. I used the "append_to_file" command to add another message to the file, and then used the "replace_in_file" command to replace a specific text in the file. I used the "list_files" command to list all files in the workspace directory, and then used the "delete_file" command to delete a specific file. Finally, I used the "read_file" command to read the contents of a file and the "replace_in_file" command to replace a specific text in the file.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "favorite_books.txt", "text": "\\n6. The Lord of the Rings by J.R.R. Tolkien"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
